name: Headers
description: This policy allows to include custom headers that will be sent to the
upstream as well as modify or delete the ones included in the original
request. Similarly, this policy also allows to add, modify, and delete
the headers included in the response.

commands.description: List of operations to apply to the headers

oneOf.title: Add a value to an existing header.
Create the header when not set, replace its value when set.
Create the header when not set, add the value when set.

value.description: Value that will be added, set or pushed in the header
